title: Making serious ranked teams (Silver, or Gold)
body:
Hey guys my IGN is pezzy I'm a silver player looking to start a ranked team in the silver to gold range
if you're interested post fill out the following and ill get back to you. If we get good enough id love to join a tournament on Battlefly http://battlefy.com/ward-up

PLEASE DO NOT JUST ADD ME AND NOT SAY ANYTHING
Skype is nessassary

IGN:

Skype:

Age:

Main Role:

Main Champion:

How often you're on:

Rank:

Why you want to play for my team:

replies.body:
Seethingsin

farouk.darwiche

d5 mid lane main

serious team

IGN: ZeroZephyr

Skype: yes and also teamspeak

Age: 16

Main Role: ADC

Main Champion: Sivir, Jinx, Lucian

How often you're on: Everyday

Rank: S1

Why you want to play for my team: I really want to play in some tournament or climb the ladder

IGN: Fuyuto

Skype: Will give later

Age: 21

Main Role: ADC and Mid

Main Champions: 
ADC - Graves, Corki, Caitlyn, Ezreal
Mid - Ahri, Fizz,  Lux, Ziggs

How often you're on: Most days

Rank: Silver 1

Why you want to play for my team: I want to try play in some tournaments with people who genuinely want to play

IGN: whitey

Skype: Will give it to you later

Age: 21

Main Role: Everywhere

Main Champion: My main is probably Shen but I am relatively good at every champion

How often you're on: Everyday

Rank: Gold 1

Why you want to play for my team: I've never been in a team and I want to experience what it's like playing one

Skype: will give you later, but I have it lol
 Age: 16
 Main Role: support, can fill anything bar ADC
Main Champion: Thresh/Morg/Braum
How often you're on: pretty much every night
Rank: Gold 4, but dropped to 5 recently
Why you want to play for my team: looking for a chance to improve

Hi, im currently in silver 5. I will be playing quite frequently, most nights of the week, some weekends, im 24 and looking to play in a serious team, that's  dedicated and looking to make it into competition.  Mostly  I play middle, or jungle. I feel like im quite a decent player in any role now though.
